review.reviewBody: Sandwiches are really good.  I've had the meatball and the brisket and cheese.  The only downside is I wish they'd expand the "sides" menu.  Maybe some potato or macaroni salad?  Some hot soup? And a few more dessert options wouldn't hurt.
Awesome hot subs jammed packed with meat and your selected additions. So happy you guys are near me!

I have ordered from this location a fair amount of times and have to say that I've been very satisfied with their quality of food and presentation, a well constructed sub. Unfortunately,  my most recent order, the Hero sandwich was made with "globs" of shaved beef, then a glob of turkey, and another glob of ham. We're the quantities good, yes. In fistful mounds, no.
